divs: Sighting DetailsAfter 20 some odd years of looking up, I have finally seen a ufo! Last night at around midnight I was watching TV when I happened to glance out the window and there was a bright orange oval shaped thing in the sky behind the trees, and it was traveling in the direction of my house. It could not have been a meteor, it was too bright and too slow. And it seemed to travel up, not down. I got too scared to walk outside and see where it was going.
Summary: BRIGHT ORANGE LIT UP THE SKY
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Atascadero
There were no other sightings in Atascadero on or around February 6th 2007
